    • Method Detail

      • findReadyToBreedAnimal

        public Animal findReadyToBreedAnimal()
        Returns an animal which is ready to breed within the radius of 7 from position (xPos, yPos). Else it returns null.
        Returns:
        An animal which is ready to breed.

      • calculatePositionValue

        public int[] calculatePositionValue(java.util.ArrayList<Needs> needList)
        Returns a position which the current animal will walk too, depending on its needs.
        Parameters:
        needList - The needs which will be considered.
        Returns:
        The new position.

      • calcRotation

        public void calcRotation(int x,
                int y)
        Calculates the correct rotation for a animal when moved.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-position which the animal will be moved to.
        y - The y-position which the animal will be moves to.

      • setPregnant

        public void setPregnant(boolean bool)
        Sets pregnant to bool. If bool == true and pregnant == false, then the hunger and thirst of this animal is set to 0.3.
        Parameters:
        bool - Pregnant will be set to this.
